name: Dream Rocket
description:
Dream Rocket is a little puzzle game with pixel art graphics based on the Game Boy color palette.
It tells a story about a boy who wants to build a rocket and travel to the Moon. In order to fulfill this dream, he must gather all the materials necessary wandering around the different rooms of the house.

Control the direction of the items as they fall with the left and right arrow keys. You can make the items fall faster by using the down arrow key.

Make sure to break the bad stones and group the moons, clouds and stars in at least three to make some space. Be careful not to fill the screen to the top, or you will have to start all over again!
